mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS displayInfoImageid, b.display_info_id, b.file_id, c.file_name, c.save_file_name, c.content_type, c.delete_flag, c.create_date, c.modify_date FROM display_info a INNER JOIN display_info_image b ON a.id = b.display_info_id INNER JOIN file_info c ON b.file_id = c.id WHERE a.id = #{displayInfoId};
